subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A.’s 66-game schedule, which was released Tuesday, has the star-studded Miami Heat making only one trip to play the Knicks at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: The N.B.A.’s 66-game schedule, which was released Tuesday, has the star-studded Miami Heat making only one trip to play the Knicks at Madison Square Garden.
